level.heading: Mutual companies - Requirements before doing business.
level.text: No domestic mutual company shall transact any business until at least 200 persons shall have subscribed in the aggregate for at least $200,000 of insurance and shall have paid in full 1 annual premium in money upon the insurance so subscribed.

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Prohibition against assessment companies, see ยง 31-4331.
